00041 struct_uc_com uc_com;
00042 
00044 UC_MESSAGE uc_new_message;
00045 
00047 unsigned char prev_data = 0;
00048 
00050 unsigned char counter_tx_timeout = 0;
00052 unsigned char counter_rx_timeout = 0;
00053 
00055 unsigned char resend_count = 0;
00056 
00058 unsigned char msg_not_acked = 0;
00059 
00061 void (*f_ptr_rx)(UC_MESSAGE);
00063 void (*f_ptr_tx)(char);
00064 
00068 void internal_comm_init(void (*func_ptr_rx)(UC_MESSAGE), void (*func_ptr_tx)(char)) {
00069         f_ptr_rx = func_ptr_rx; //To know which function we should call to parse a message
00070         f_ptr_tx = func_ptr_tx; //To know which function we should call to send data
00071         
00072         uc_com.char_count = 0;
00073         uc_com.checksum = 0;
00074         uc_com.flags = 0;
00075         
00076         int_comm_rx_queue_dropall();
00077         int_comm_tx_queue_dropall();
00078 }
00079 
00081 void internal_comm_reset_rx(void) {
00082         uc_com.char_count = 0;
00083         uc_com.checksum = 0;
00084         uc_com.flags = 0;
00085         prev_data = 0;
00086 }
00087 
00091 unsigned char internal_comm_poll_rx_queue(void) {
00092         if (!int_comm_rx_queue_is_empty()) {
00093                 f_ptr_rx(int_comm_rx_queue_get());      //Send the first message to the function
00094                 
00095                 int_comm_rx_queue_drop();                                       //Drop the message from the queue since it's been executed
00096                 return(1);                                                              //Return 1 to show that something was done
00097         }
00098         
00099         return(0);
00100 }
00101 
00105 unsigned char internal_comm_poll_tx_queue(void) {
00106         if ((!int_comm_tx_queue_is_empty()) && (msg_not_acked == 0)) {
00107                 //Send the first message in the queue
00108                 internal_comm_send_message(int_comm_tx_queue_get());    
00109                 
00110                 msg_not_acked = 1;              
00111                 return(1);      //Return 1 to show that something was done
00112         }
00113         
00114         return(0);
00115 }
00116 
00118 void internal_comm_send_ack(void) {
00119         unsigned char checksum = UC_COMM_MSG_ACK;
00120         
00121         f_ptr_tx(UC_COMM_MSG_PREAMBLE);
00122         f_ptr_tx(UC_COMM_MSG_PREAMBLE);
00123         f_ptr_tx(checksum);
00124         f_ptr_tx(UC_COMM_MSG_ACK);
00125         f_ptr_tx(0);
00126         f_ptr_tx(UC_COMM_MSG_POSTAMBLE);
00127         
00128         counter_tx_timeout = 0;
00129 }
00130 
00132 void internal_comm_send_nack(void) {
00133         unsigned char checksum = UC_COMM_MSG_NACK;
00134         
00135         f_ptr_tx(UC_COMM_MSG_PREAMBLE);
00136         f_ptr_tx(UC_COMM_MSG_PREAMBLE);
00137         f_ptr_tx(checksum);
00138         f_ptr_tx(UC_COMM_MSG_NACK);
00139         f_ptr_tx(0);
00140         f_ptr_tx(UC_COMM_MSG_POSTAMBLE);
00141         
00142         counter_tx_timeout = 0;
00143 }
00144 
00147 void internal_comm_send_message(UC_MESSAGE tx_message) {
00148         f_ptr_tx(UC_COMM_MSG_PREAMBLE);
00149         f_ptr_tx(UC_COMM_MSG_PREAMBLE);
00150         f_ptr_tx(tx_message.checksum);
00151         f_ptr_tx(tx_message.cmd);
00152         f_ptr_tx(tx_message.length);
00153         
00154         for (unsigned char i=0;i<tx_message.length;i++)
00155                 f_ptr_tx(tx_message.data[i]);
00156         
00157         f_ptr_tx(UC_COMM_MSG_POSTAMBLE);
00158         
00159         counter_tx_timeout = 0;
00160 }
00161 
00166 void internal_comm_add_tx_message(unsigned char command, unsigned char length, char *data) {
00167         UC_MESSAGE new_mess;
00168         
00169         new_mess.checksum = command + length;
00170         
00171         new_mess.cmd = command;
00172         new_mess.length = length;
00173         
00174         for (unsigned char i=0;i<length;i++) {
00175                 new_mess.checksum += data[i];
00176                 new_mess.data[i] = data[i];
00177         }
00178         
00179         int_comm_tx_queue_add(new_mess);
00180 }
00181 
00183 void internal_comm_resend(void) {
00184         if (resend_count < UC_COMM_RESEND_COUNT) {
00185                 if (msg_not_acked == 1) {
00186                         internal_comm_send_message(int_comm_tx_queue_get());
00187                         resend_count++;
00188                 }
00189         }
00190         else {
00191                 #ifdef DEVICE_TYPE_MAIN_FRONT_UNIT
00192                         led_set_error(LED_STATE_ON);
00193                         
00194                         //Set the error flag
00195                         event_set_error(ERROR_TYPE_INT_COMM_RESEND,1);
00196                 #endif
00197         }
00198 }

00201 ISR(ISR_INTERNAL_COMM_USART_RECV) {
00202         unsigned char data = INTERNAL_COMM_UDR;
00203         uc_com.char_count++;
00204         
00205         counter_rx_timeout = 0;
00206         
00207         if (uc_com.flags && (1<<UC_PREAMBLE_FOUND)) {
00208                 //Check if this is a postamble
00209                 if ((uc_com.char_count >= 4) && (data == UC_COMM_MSG_POSTAMBLE)) {
00210                         if (uc_new_message.length == (uc_com.char_count-4)) {
00211                                 if (uc_new_message.checksum == uc_com.checksum) {
00212                                         if (uc_new_message.cmd == UC_COMM_MSG_ACK) {
00213                                                 //Last TXed message was acked, lets drop the message from the TX queue
00214                                                 int_comm_tx_queue_drop();
00215                                                 msg_not_acked = 0;
00216                                                 resend_count = 0;
00217                                         }
00218                                         else if (uc_new_message.cmd == UC_COMM_MSG_NACK) {
00219                                                 internal_comm_resend();
00220                                         }
00221                                         else {
00222                                                 //Add the message to the RX queue
00223                                                 int_comm_rx_queue_add(uc_new_message);
00224                                                 //Send ack to acknowledge we recieved the package
00225                                                 internal_comm_send_ack();
00226                                         }
00227                                 }
00228                                 else
00229                                         internal_comm_send_nack();
00230                                 
00231                                 uc_com.flags &= ~(1<<UC_PREAMBLE_FOUND);
00232                                 uc_com.char_count = 0;
00233                         }
00234                         else {
00235                                 if ((uc_com.char_count - 4) < UC_MESSAGE_DATA_SIZE) {
00236                                         uc_new_message.data[uc_com.char_count - 4] = data;
00237                                         uc_com.checksum += data;
00238                                 }
00239                         }
00240                 }
00241                 else {
00242                         switch(uc_com.char_count) {
00243                                 case 1 :
00244                                         uc_new_message.checksum = data;
00245                                         break;
00246                                 case 2 :
00247                                         uc_new_message.cmd = data;
00248                                         uc_com.checksum = data;
00249                                         break;                          
00250                                 case 3 :        
00251                                         uc_new_message.length = data;
00252                                         uc_com.checksum += data;
00253                                         break;
00254                                 default:        
00255                                         if ((uc_com.char_count - 4) < UC_MESSAGE_DATA_SIZE) {
00256                                                 uc_new_message.data[uc_com.char_count - 4] = data;
00257                                                 uc_com.checksum += data;
00258                                         }
00259                                 break;
00260                         }
00261                 }
00262         }
00263         else if (data == UC_COMM_MSG_PREAMBLE) {
00264                 //Is this a preamble or just a variable sent?
00265                 if (prev_data == UC_COMM_MSG_PREAMBLE) {
00266                         uc_com.flags |= (1 << UC_PREAMBLE_FOUND);
00267                         uc_com.char_count = 0;
00268                 }
00269         }
00270         
00271         prev_data = data;
00272 }

00276         
00277 }

00280 void internal_comm_1ms_timer(void) {
00281         if (counter_rx_timeout >= UC_COMM_RX_TIMEOUT)
00282                 internal_comm_reset_rx();
00283                 
00284         if (counter_tx_timeout >= UC_COMM_TX_TIMEOUT)
00285                 internal_comm_resend();
00286 
00287         counter_tx_timeout++;
00288         counter_rx_timeout++;
00289 }
